articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: Ukraine updates: France and UK propose 'reassurance force' - DW (English)
articles.description: France and the UK told European leaders in Paris their plan for a military presence in Ukraine after any potential ceasefire with Russia. It comes as Russia continues deadly airstrikes. DW has more.
articles.content:
North Korea has sent 3,000 more troops to Russia as reinforcement this year, South Korea's military said on Thursday. 
According to Seoul, Pyongyang also continues aiding Moscow's Ukraine war effort… [+992 chars]

articles.author: Claudia Chiappa
articles.title: Nearly 3M HIV deaths due to foreign aid cuts, study forecasts - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Researchers warn that decades of progress in HIV treatment and prevention could be undone.
articles.content: Over 10 million more people could be infected with HIV and nearly 3 million people could die by the end of the decade because of foreign aid cuts by Western governments, new research published today … [+534 chars]
